project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A web-based portal that streamlines the onboarding process, improves customer self-service, and enhances customer success management efficiency.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to securely log in using their main SaaS product credentials.
technical_requirements: Implement SAML or OpenID Connect for SSO
acceptance_criteria: Customers can log in to the COSP using their existing credentials
Seamless integration with the identity provider

feature_breakdown.description: Display a personalized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription level.
technical_requirements: Integrate with CRM or subscription management system
Implement a rules-based engine to generate checklists
Allow for customization and updates to onboarding workflows
acceptance_criteria: Customers see an accurate onboarding checklist based on their subscription tier
Checklist items can be marked as completed

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to allow seamless content searching and viewing.
technical_requirements: Implement API client to fetch and display knowledge base articles
Provide search functionality within the COSP
acceptance_criteria: Customers can search and view relevant knowledge base content within the COSP
Knowledge base content is up-to-date and accurate

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's adoption metrics (e.g., daily active users, feature usage count).
technical_requirements: Integrate with product analytics or usage tracking system
Implement data aggregation and visualization components
acceptance_criteria: Customers can view their key adoption metrics in a clear and intuitive dashboard
Dashboard data is accurate and up-to-date

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details.
technical_requirements: Integrate with the CRM system to fetch customer data
Implement email or ticket creation functionality
acceptance_criteria: Customers can easily contact their CSM with pre-populated details
Tickets or emails are correctly routed to the appropriate CSM

technical_architecture.data_flow: User requests are routed through the API Gateway, which dispatches to the appropriate microservices for data retrieval, processing, and response. Microservices communicate with the database and external APIs as needed to fulfill the request.
security_considerations: Implement role-based access control (RBAC) for user permissions
Use industry-standard encryption (TLS 1.2+) for all data in transit
Enforce secure coding practices and regular security audits

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the core functionality of the COSP, focusing on the critical requirements.
deliverables: Integration with identity provider and knowledge base

implementation_phases.description: Expand the COSP functionality to include advanced features and integrations.
deliverables: Enhanced COSP with adoption metrics and CSM integration

risk_analysis.description: Delays in third-party API integrations (CRM, Knowledge Base, etc.)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Engage with third-party vendors early, establish clear communication and escalation processes, and have contingency plans for alternative solutions.

risk_analysis.description: Complexity of the personalized onboarding checklist feature
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Prioritize a minimum viable set of onboarding workflows, implement a flexible and extensible rules engine, and allocate sufficient time and resources for thorough testing.
Implement a microservices architecture, optimize database queries, leverage caching strategies, and conduct load testing to identify and address performance bottlenecks.

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Track customer retention and cancellation rates

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monitor the time between customer onboarding and first feature adoption

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce time spent on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Track and compare CSM time spent on onboarding tasks before and after COSP deployment

success_metrics.target_value: Increase to 40% of support questions resolved via the portal
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monitor the percentage of support tickets created vs. questions resolved through the COSP
